title: The Shadow Men
description:
Witch Cage: A woman buys a medieval jail… and tries to make it her home.

Phantom Border Agent: A border agent encounters his long-dead colleague in the middle of the desert.
itunes:title: The Shadow Men
itunes:subtitle: Witch Cage: A woman buys a medieval jail… and tries to make it her home. To hear more about her experiences, check out Vanessa Mitchell’s book, Spirits of the Cage: True Accounts of Living in a Haunted Medieval Prison, co-written with Richard Estep. Vane
author: stats@snapjudgment.org (Snap Judgment)
itunes:author: Snap Judgment and WNYC Studios

Witch Cage: A woman buys a medieval jail… and tries to make it her home.
